meta.author: Anurag Jain & Arvind Ravulavaru
meta.tagline: A Simple Text based Adventure game written in Javascript
meta.welcome: Welcome to Maya - A pilot written to test the text based adventure game engine written in Javascript. The aim of the game is to find the exit gate and leave the maze.

room1.description: You are on the other side of a burnt broken bridge, you look back to see the debris and a steady stream of water. You turn around and see a fountain. (hint : navigate around to explore [ex: `go north`])
room1.contextualHelp: Look around and see if you can find something you can use

room2.description: You are near the fountain. It is in front of a huge mansion. There is a half filled bottle of water just besides it
room2.contextualHelp: Water is helpful when you are dehydrated from all the walking around

room3.description: There are trees all around you. There is a sword lying besides you.
room3.contextualHelp: You can use swords to kill enemies

actions.pick sword: You have picked up a sword.

room4.description: Tall trees are all around you. A speck of light is coming from the south.

room5.description: There are trees all around you

room6.description: You have reached the entrance of the huge mansion. The door is locked and all the windows in the front are bolted
room6.contextualHelp: Huge mansions are a treasure of objects :)

room7.description: You are standing on the banks of a fast flowing river.
room7.contextualHelp: Ahh!! If only I knew where to go

room8.description: You are at the exit gates!! You finally made it!! Thanks for playing Super Maze
